snippet.title: Chinese horror survival game:"Uncanny Labyrinth"
snippet.description:
Hello everyone
I am Triztan, an independent game producer from China.
The maze-themed survival horror multiplayer online game "Uncanny Labyrinth", which took nine months to develop, opened a free trial on Steam yesterday

Everyone is invited to experience it here
I really need your opinions and support
Come help me find the shortcomings of this game and what people think is the bright spot.

Store page link:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2812670/_/

And if I don’t mention the gameplay here, you will definitely be too lazy to see what it is about, so I will briefly introduce some of it.

The game is inspired by the movie Maze Runner.
Players will appear naked in the center of a mysterious maze. They have to explore the maze, collect supplies, find out the route, decipher the secrets, deal with monsters, and escape to a safe area before the door closes every day.
Organize resources, build houses, and farm in the safe area. Then, when the gate opens the next day, you can embark on a new day of maze adventure with the prepared equipment and medicines until you escape the maze.

The whole thing is a combination of multiplayer online horror games and survival construction games, which gives the survival game a final goal and makes the horror game more playable.

Interested players really hope to download the free trial to experience it, and then join the 
Discord group: https://discord.gg/YTxJEugemu 
to give your feedback and suggestions.

Of course, if you can give me a wish list, I would be very grateful.
